arts.ttl: Confirmed lineups: FC Augsburg vs. Bayern Munich
arts.sum: It's the Bavarian derby in the Bundesliga! Augsburg's headcoach Sandro Wagner stands in the spotlight when his side face Rekordmeister Bayern Munich in the WWK Arena - who will come out on top? Here are the confirmed lineups for both teams.

arts.ttl: Augsburg vs Bayern Munich – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Augsburg and Bayern Munich go head-to-head in the Bundesliga on Saturday. Both sides will be searching for a positive start to their Bundesliga campaigns, with Bayern Munich looking to defend their title and Augsburg aiming to establish themselves under new management at the WWK Arena. arts.ttl: Augsburg vs. Bayern Munich preview: The Return of an old acquaintance
arts.sum: Bavaria braces for a fascinating Bundesliga clash this weekend as Bayern Munich travel to face FC Augsburg in the highlighted top game on Saturday. Beyond the three points at stake, the spotlight once again falls on Sandro Wagner. Find out more about predicted lineups and squad news here.

arts.ttl: Harry Kane misses Bayern's final training session ahead of Augsburg clash
arts.sum: Bild reports that Harry Kane is not involved in Bayern’s final training session ahead of Saturday’s clash with Augsburg.
